faq.title: How do I place an order?
faq.description: You can browse our menu, select your favorite dishes, and add them to the cart. Once you’re ready, proceed to checkout and choose your preferred payment option.

faq.title: Do you offer home delivery?
faq.description: Yes, we provide freshly prepared food delivery to your doorstep. Delivery times vary between 30–60 minutes depending on the Order

faq.title: Are your meals freshly cooked?
faq.description: Absolutely! All our dishes are prepared fresh upon order using high-quality ingredients, with no preservatives or artificial flavors.

faq.title: What are the delivery charges?
faq.description: elivery is free above a minimum order value of 200. For smaller orders, a small delivery fee 20 rupees apply

faq.title: Can I schedule an order in advance?
faq.description: Yes, you can schedule your order for a specific time and date at checkout, and we’ll deliver your food fresh when you need it.

faq.title: What is your cancellation or refund policy?
faq.description: Orders can be canceled within 5 minutes of placing them. Refunds for prepaid orders are processed immediately. For any issues with your meal, please contact us immediately for a replacement or refund.

menu.home: We don't just cook -- we plot, play, and sometimes even pray over pot.
menu.about: Nom Nom is a glorified food diary - It's a living archive of edible drama. It's culture, history, tantrums, and a good butter-glistened bribe.
menu.products: Every dish begins somewhere between a craving an a cultural flashback!

slides.contentText: Born in kitchen, raised by flavor's, and emotionally damaged by under-seasoned food
Every dish begins somewhere between a craving an a cultural flashback!

features.title: Money Back Guarantee
features.description: Not happy? Get a full refund, no questions asked.

features.description: Always here, anytime you need us.
